text: Crazy good food. Forget about the stuff you been callin food. This is food! Best cod, squid is so fantastic you'll want to keep ordering.

Aller pas la pressé de manger ! Je le conseil infiniment pour une belle soirée d'été légèrement arrosé avec de bons amis !!! C'est ce que j'ai fais et j'y suis retourné seule prendre un poulet pour emporter et j'ai été très bien reçu, le poulet était insane pour un prix très abordable. Restaurant du quartier qui va rester j'en suis sur :)
One of the best Portuguese restaurants in town. Don't go there for the service. Go there for the quality home-like food and cozy atmosphere.

AMAZING !!! Usually, when I order chicken thighs, the meat inside is too dry. However, this cozy restaurant serves one of the best chickens I have ever had. I did not have any high expectations for some reason when my best friend told me it was his favourite place, but i was very very wrong. This place is so so so good. Definitely would go back again, for sure!
